featured.text: He was still not satisfied and sent them back again!
Most young people in Taiwan are not satisfied with a high school _____ and continue to pursue further education in college.
They have created a shopping environment where the needs of both mother and daughter are satisfied.

definition.zh_def: 感到滿意或滿足的狀態。
definition.en_def: Feeling pleased or content with something.
definition.example: She was satisfied with her exam results.
